meanings.definition: A type of exercise involving explosive movements to develop power and strength.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy incorporating plyometrics into my workout routine.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often use plyometrics to enhance their performance on the field.
meanings.sent3: The gym was filled with the sound of people doing plyometrics, it was like a symphony of jumps and bounds.
meanings.sent4: Her progress in plyometrics was like watching a seed grow into a towering tree.
meanings.sent5: The coach emphasized the importance of proper form in plyometrics to prevent injuries.

meanings.definition: The practice of plyometric exercises to improve athletic performance.
meanings.sent1: Plyometrics can help athletes jump higher and run faster.
meanings.sent2: Many track and field athletes incorporate plyometrics into their training regimen.
meanings.sent3: The team's mascot decided to join in on the plyometrics session, hopping around in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to plyometrics was like a secret weapon, giving him an edge over his competitors.
meanings.sent5: The gym echoed with the sounds of athletes pushing themselves to the limit with plyometrics.
